original_text: This they said to test him, that they might have some charge to bring against him. Jesus bent down and wrote with his finger on the ground.
korean_text: 그들이 이렇게 말함은 고발할 조건을 얻고자 하여 예수를 시험함이러라 예수께서 몸을 굽히사 손가락으로 땅에 쓰시니

sentences.original_text: This they said to test him
that they might have some charge to bring against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 고발할 조건을 얻기 위함이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and wrote with his finger on the ground
